response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product. This item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am excited to extend this offer. Considering its significance and the benefits it can bring to you, I propose a price of $1,200,000. This figure reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the mutual benefit we can achieve through this transaction. Should you find this proposal favorable, please let me know, and we can proceed to finalize the details. Thank you for considering this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
